text:
A Central Industrial Security Force jawan, who was on duty at the Indian Space Research Centre’s Propulsion Research Complex at Mahendragiri, fell down from a watchtower and died in the small hours of Wednesday.

Police said Jayakumar (54) of Kollam district in Kerala, who was on duty in one of the 15 watchtowers of the complex, was getting down around 2 a.m. when he reportedly lost balance, fell on the ground and died on the spot. Panagudi police sent the body to Kanyakumari Government Medical College Hospital at Asaripallam in Nagercoil for post-mortem.
title: Fatal fall for jawan
